document.heading: Access to Youth Employment Programs Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-223, the “Access to Youth Employment Programs Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-442, which was referred to the Committee of Workforce Development and Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 3, 2008, and July 1, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 16, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-443 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-223 became effective on September 11, 2008.
